ygData.subject: Re:   Fugitive
ygData.msgSnippet: Technosis: I was just calling out to Termitron. Did he kill Gramps? Never mind. Technosis runs into the base and looks around. He finds pieces of Gramps

Technosis: I was just calling out to Termitron. Did he kill Gramps? Never
mind.

Technosis runs into the base and looks around. He finds pieces of Gramps
everywhere.

Technosis: What am I going to tell Perplex! He's going to be upset...

----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 12:20 AM
Subject: Fugitive


> Windlord:
>
> Windlord heard the Technosis's screams and ran towards the base where
> he asked to Technosis "What's going on???"
>
> Windlord had a bad feeling... he almost could say what had happened??
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Technosis spins around and faces Atma and Psuedo.
> >
> > Technosis: Oh, no. What am I going to say to Perplex? What am I
> going to say to Perplex? Termitron!...
> >
> >   ----- Original Message -----
> >   From: Alloran2@a...
> >   To: nbwrpg@y...
> >   Sent: Sunday, February 25, 2001 8:02 PM
> >   Subject: Im Back!
> >
> >
> >   OOC: I just got back from Stratton, Vermont(Awesome skiing
> trip!).  I just
> >   read a ton of messages, so forgive me if i get anything wrong and
> correct me.
> >    Jason, Tigerhawk is with Airazor heading back to the CF.
> >
> >   :::Wheeljack/Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian/The
> >   Destrocons/Falcon/Snare/Sideswipe/Time Warp/Atma/Psuedo:::
> >
> >   ::Wheeljack programmed his drones, and actvated the defense
> mechanism.  The
> >   drones ran around for awhile, but they were all eventually taken
> out by the
> >   torpedos and homing missles.  Wheeljack smiles from ear to ear::
> >   Wheeljack: SUCCESS!  We should report this to Zardus!
> >   ~~~~~
> >   ::Obsidian and Bludgeon hear Drillbit's transmission and head to
> Hell Beasts
> >   base. Starscream finds Drillbit::
> >   Starscream: Im here Drillbit, buddy.
> >   ::He tunnels with him and reaches Hell Beast base.  Bludgeon and
> Obsidian
> >   arrive around the same time::
> >   ~~~~~
> >   ::My Destrons hear Magmatron and transform to their flight modes
> and head to
> >   Hell Beasts base::
> >   ~~~~~
> >   ::Sideswipe gets hit by one of Squawkbox's shots, but escapes the
> other. He
> >   transforms to robot mode, but by the time his guns are ready
> Squawktalk and
> >   Beastbox had left::
> >   ~~~~~
> >   ::Time Warp is just as ticked as Airbomber::
> >   Time Warp: Its obvious that Infectra isnt here! Lets get out of
> here before
> >   we get killed!
> >   ~~~~~
> >   ::Atma and Psuedo watch Gramps' death, when they hear Technosis.
> They run
> >   after her::
> >   Psuedo: Gramps is dead.
> >   Atma: I think Termitron killed him.
